page.title: Turbo Booster
page.t: Your ship doesn't have the correct device to enable turbo, requires \033R%s\033X
The turbo booster is still charging, Current Level=\033R%s%\033X; must be above 15%
Not enought energy available to engage turbo booster
\033RWARNING\033X Turbo Booster disengaged, not enough energy remaining
\033RWARNING\033X Turbo Booster disengaged, requires cool down

page.title: Boardcomp. objects
page.t: The Turbo Booster \(Small\) allows your smaller ships to travel at faster speeds while it's engaged. It requires energy cells to keep it running.
The Turbo Booster \(Large\) allows your capital class ship to travel at faster speeds while it's engaged. It requires energy cells to keep it running.
